    2: namespace Symbiotatk\Symbtk\Model\Yaml\Rc;
    3:
    4: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk\File AS File;
    5: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk\Model AS Model;
    6: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk\File\Model\Yaml AS Yaml;
    7:
    8: /** \Model\Yaml\Rc object containing raw, template_vars, and array parameters.
    9: * @return Object $yaml_rc
    10: */
    11: function Def() {
    12: $obj = new \stdClass();
    13: $obj->raw = false;
    14: $obj->template_vars = false;
    15: $obj->rc = false;
    16:
    17: return $obj;
    18: }
    19:
    20: /** Parse Rc file located at file path.
    21: * @param String $path
    22: * @return Object \Model\Yaml\Rc\\$object
    23: */
    24: function Parse(String $path) {
    25: $def = Def();
    26:
    27: $def->raw = File\read($path);
    28: $def->template_vars = Model\Template\Variables($def->raw);
    29: $def->rc = Yaml\decode($def->raw);
    30:
    31: return $def;
    32: }
